programme.title: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que os ataques do dia 11 de setembro fazem parte de uma conspiração, e se dispõe para trazer a verdade à luz. Enquanto isso, o senhor Mackey apenas quer saber quem foi o infeliz que defecou no mictório.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Kyle se tornam prisioneiros do Pentágono até contarem exatamente como chegaram à Terra da Imaginação. Cartman não desistirá da aposta e quer que Kyle chupe suas bolas, conforme o combinado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Quando estão na Terra da Imaginação, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exército de forças imaginárias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginárias não são reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginação.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: As meninas do quarto ano fizeram uma lista secreta que dá nota a todos os garotos, do mais bonito ao mais feio. Os garotos roubam a lista e os resultados não são o que eles esperavam.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Enquanto a cidade está ocupada apontando culpados pela crise econômica, Randy apresenta uma solução para as dificuldades financeiras. Com a ajuda de todos os moradores, a cidade passa a viver sem qualquer economia.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan se mobiliza para impedir que os japoneses matem todas as baleias e os golfinhos do mundo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: As últimas notícias sobre testes científicos realizados na escola de South Park revelam que alguns dos meninos estão viciados em sexo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle, Cartman Kenny e Stan se juntam com os cidadãos de South Park e lutam bravamente contra a dominação de Nova Jersey em uma onda que está afetando todo o país
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle está "intestinalmente" envolvido no desenvolvimento de um novo produto revolucionário que será lançado pela Apple chamado HumancentiPad.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle participa do mais recente empreendimento de Cartman, a Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack

programme.title: Os garotos estão próximos de descobrir a verdade sobre o primeiro Dia de Ação de Graças da história dos Estados Unidos.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Dia de Ação de Graças no History Channel

programme.title: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Renegado Impiedoso, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: Pardon Chato é um índio Apache mestiço que vive na linha entre duas culturas, balanceando a sua tribo com o encantamento que tem pelo mundo dos brancos.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: A Pistola do Mal, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Gunfighter Lorn Warfield volta para casa após uma ausência de três anos. Lorn encontra seu rancho em ruínas. Seu vizinho, Owen Forbes, informa Lorn que seu rancho foi invadido pelos apaches que sequestraram sua esposa e dois filhos.

programme.title: Django Atira Primeiro, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Django sai a procura de seu pai que teve a cabeça colocada à prêmio, e chega tarde demais, pois ele fora assassinado por um caçador de recompensas.

programme.title: O Homem Que Luta Só, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Ben Brigade, caçador de recompensas, captura o valioso pistoleiro Billy John e segue para Santa Cruz, onde o entregará às autoridades e receberá o prêmio.

programme.title: A Vingança de Ulzana, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: Arizona, século XIX. Quando um grupo de índios apaches desertores, liderados pelo terrível Ulzana, começa a saquear e massacrar as pessoas que vivem nos campos.

programme.title: A Morte Anda a Cavalo, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Bill Meceita testemunha o assassinato de sua família quando criança e cresce com desejo de vingança. Ele se une a Ryan, um pistoleiro, e saem à procura do bandido Walcot, mas ele logo descobre que Ryan esconde um segredo sobre o seu passado.

programme.title: A Marca Rubra, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Choya, um pistoleiro de moral distorcida, é convencido por Leffingwell a se passar pelo filho do rancheiro Richard Lavery, que está desaparecido há vinte e cinco anos e, com isso, possa herdar a fortuna de sua família.

programme.title: Quatro Confissões, (1940, Western)
programme.desc: Um trapaceiro, um padre e um minerador esperam, em uma estação em ruínas, a chegada do trem.

programme.title: O Ouro de Mackenna, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Gregory Peck e Omar Sharif lutam para descobrir um lendário esconderijo de ouro, nesta espetacular aventura no Velho Oeste..

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Intermediário.com, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. O empresário Jack Harris tem uma linda família e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemáticas. Até que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: Crimes Obscuros, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: O policial Tadek investiga um caso de assassinato não resolvido e encontra semelhanças do crime em um livro do artista polonês Krystov Kozlow. Ele começa a investigar a vida do escritor e da sua namorada, uma mulher misteriosa que trabalha num sex club.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Teia De Crimes, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: O xerife Alden Rockwell está se preparando para uma aposentadoria indesejada até que seu velho amigo de guerra e xerife vizinho, Clint, é misteriosamente baleado. Imediatamente a esposa de Clint pressiona Alden para investigar o tiroteio.

programme.title: Apartamento 3D - O mal mora ao lado, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Tudo parece perfeito para Erin e Ben depois que eles se mudam para um novo apartamento em Nova York, até que um estranho fica obcecado por eles.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Intermediário.com, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. O empresário Jack Harris tem uma linda família e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemáticas. Até que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: Legado de Violência, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negócios perigosos e pessoas de mau caráter foge, um pai se vê em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: Busca de Vingança, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em um conto clássico de Edgar Allan Poe, este filme desafia a percepção da realidade. Busca de Vingança nos mostra como Edgar torna se uma força de terror contra qualquer um que está entre ele e seu desejo de vingança.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: O Mistério de Anne, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma mulher mentalmente doente com um grave distúrbio de personalidade desenvolve uma estranha relação com suas bonecas. Ela se torna vítima de insônia e até mesmo de automutilação. Cabe a seu filho revelar a estranha verdade sobre a doença de Anne.

programme.title: O Trevo Vermelho, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um duende malvado que foi aprisionado nas raízes de um velho carvalho é acidentalmente solto no Dia de São Patrício. Uma vez livre, ele realiza sua vingança sangrenta contra as pessoas que originalmente o aprisionaram.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: Velocipastor, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Depois de perder seus pais, um padre viaja para a China, onde herda uma habilidade misteriosa que lhe permite se tornar um dinossauro. Horrorizado com esse novo poder, uma prostituta o convence a usá-lo para combater o crime.

programme.title: Gakusanjin é derrotado pelos ascetas. Inuyasha e sua turma seguem as crianças e chegam a um templo na montanha a leste.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O compromisso do casal para o uso da Jóia (Parte 1)

programme.title: Gakusanjin é derrotado pelos ascetas. Inuyasha e sua turma seguem as crianças e chegam a um templo na montanha a leste.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O compromisso do casal para o uso da Jóia (Parte 2)

programme.title: Hakudoshi está planejando tomar o lugar de Naraku. Ele rouba os fragmentos da Jóia Shikon de Kagome e seduz Kagura para trair Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Após curar suas feridas infligidas por Naraku, usando a alma de Midoriko, Kikyo encontra novamente Inuyasha e revela o segredo para destruir Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: É o dia do anual Exame de Promoção de Demônio Raposa. Miroku e seus amigos ficam presos nos testes. Shippo tira sarro de Inuyasha e sobe no ranking.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O ferreiro Toshu forjou uma lâmina de demônio usando uma das escamas de Ryujin, e a Dakki nasceu. Toda vez que Inuyasha tenta atacar, ele é prejudicado pela energia demoníaca.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: A Tessaiga de Escamas de Dragão

programme.title: O Tetsusaiga atingiu o poder das escamas de dragão. A fim de poder usar rapidamente o poder demoníaco, Inuyasha não tem escolha a não ser passar por treinamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Koga chegam ao local da luta de Moryomaru e Naraku. Mas Moryomaru, que quer seus cacos de Shikon, pega Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kikyo foi contaminado pela teia de aranha de Naraku. Para salvá-la, Inuyasha e Kagome precisam da corda do arco no mausoléu do Monte Azusa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kikyo tenta purificar Naraku e seus fragmentos de Shikon. Ela também tenta purificar a vontade de Midoriko que controla os cacos nas pernas de Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru pergunta a sua mãe como ele pode expandir o Meido de Tenseiga, o caminho para o submundo. Em resposta, sua mãe usa a pedra Meido que o pai de Sesshoumaru lhe deu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Príncipe das Flores é um demônio que se alimenta de corações tristes ou angustiados. Deslumbrado pela fragrância da flor, Inuyasha está envolvido em um sonho falso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Espelho Demoníaco rouba a energia demoníaca de Tetsusaiga. Inuyasha contra-ataca, apesar de sofrer alguns golpes ferozes, mas todos os seus ataques apontados para o Espelho Demoníaco acabam sendo tomados por Kanna.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A fim de derrotar os demônios, Sango reveste Hiraikotsu com veneno. Para purificá-lo do veneno, o Mestre das Poções diz que ela deve derrotar o demônio dentro do jarro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: OS Sentimentos de Sango, A Decisão de Mirok

programme.title: Shishinki, o Ogre da Morte, aparece diante de Sesshomaru, dizendo a ele que Inuyasha e o pai de Sesshoumaru roubaram seu Meido Zangetsuha em uma batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru fica furioso quando descobre o segredo por trás do Tenseiga. Totosai tenta convencer Sesshoumaru de que ele irá superar seu pai uma vez que ele seja capaz de abandonar seu apego à espada, bem como seu ódio a Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru rouba o poder de Tetsusaiga com Tenseiga, fortalecido pela lembrança de Kanna, um fragmento do Mirror Demon. Inuyasha se transforma em sua forma demoníaca e tenta atacar, mas Sesshoumaru dispara seu Meido Zangetsuha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A sacerdotisa Hitomiko perdeu a vida nas mãos de Naraku. Mas ela volta à vida e tranca Kagome dentro de uma barreira. Então, o verdadeiro poder espiritual do arco do Monte Azusa se revela!
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Kaede tentam descobrir o que está bloqueando os poderes de Kagome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kohaku permanece inconsciente depois de ser encarado por Magatsuhi, a vontade do mal. Kagome está preocupada, mas ela tem que se curvar e estudar para os exames de admissão, então ela decide voltar para casa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru persegue a má vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas é apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku está atrás do último fragmento de Shikon e ele toma Kagome como refém.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: O Momento da Joia Ficar Completa

programme.title: Kagome se forma no ensino médio e retorna à era feudal. Shippo e Kohaku ficam na aldeia de Kaede, enquanto o resto da gangue se dirige para a batalha de Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O coração de Inuyasha é devorado pelo veneno da Jóia de Shikon, e ele se transforma em sua forma demoníaca. Ele machuca Kagome e a escuridão em seu coração toma conta dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Os poderes espirituais de Kagome são restaurados e a luz divina é revivida na Jóia Shikon de Naraku. No entanto, Naraku usa isso como um chamariz para atrair Sango em sua armadilha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku tem vivido como um demônio apesar de ter um coração humano. Enquanto lutava contra ele, Kagome pergunta sobre seu verdadeiro desejo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku se dirige para o Poço do Comedor de Ossos e desaparece! Antes de desaparecer, Naraku faz seu último desejo para Kagome, ferido pelas mãos de Byakuya, ser engolido em Meido, o caminho para o submundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Quando a última pessoa a obter a Jóia Shikon faz o único desejo correto, a jóia será purificada e desaparecerá inteiramente deste mundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Anos após ser selado, Inuyasha, o meio-youkai é acordado por uma garota do ensino médio chamada Agome, que viajou no tempo atraves do poço Come-Ossos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Garota que Volta no Tempo e o Garoto Lacrado

programme.title: Concedido o poder de controlar Inuyasha, Agome descobre que ela pode ser a reencarnação da irmã mais velha de Kaede, Kikyo, que selou Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: As Pessoas Atrás da Joia de Quatro Almas

programme.title: Agome e Inuyasha precisam das habilidades do outro para reunir os fragmentos dispersos da Jóia de Quatro Almas, mas os dois não se dão bem.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Volta Através do Poço Come-Ossos

programme.title: De volta ao presente, Agome está relaxando em casa quando Inuyasha vem procurá-la, e ela retorna com ele ao passado para encontrar Yura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O meio irmão de Inuyasha, Sesshomaru, aparece procurando pelo túmulo de seu pai que era um youkai-cachorro. Agome aprende sobre o passado de Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Apesar da ajuda de Agome em frustrá-lo, Sesshomaru descobre a localização do túmulo do pai de Inuyasha, que contém uma espada que ele deseja.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Tessaiga, O Canino de Aço Destruidor

programme.title: Jotaro avisa Koichi para ter muito cuidado e o impede de perseguir Kira, mas Koichi abaixa a guarda e é atacado pelo Stand explosivo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira, o assassino em série, aparece e Koichi fica indignado. Kira ainda está furioso por ter sido humilhado em público e o agride.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Jotaro vasculham a casa onde Kira vivia e descobrem uma coleção esquisita. Uma câmera Polaroid em uma mesa tira uma foto deles.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yoshihiro Kira procura usuários de Stand para ajudá-lo a proteger o filho. Um rapaz pede a Rohan, que está perseguindo Kira, para jogar pedra, papel ou tesoura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O pivete do Janken vem aí!

programme.title: Kira vive como Kosaku Kawajiri, mas tem vontade de matar depois de ver o pescoço da esposa. Josuke e Okuyasu encontram um homem estranho em um campo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan suspeita que Josuke está trapaceando nos dados e aposta que consegue descobrir como. Se Rohan ganhar a próxima rodada, Josuke perderá um dedo mindinho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke é perseguido por um Stand e tem que andar de bicicleta a mais de 60 km/h para não ser pego. Ele tenta ligar para Koichi, mas ainda não é seguro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri vai até o porão para confrontar um gato com um buraco na garganta, mas o encontra morto. No dia seguinte, uma planta estranha cresce na sepultura do gato.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Convencido de que Kawajiri é seu filho, Yoshihiro faz de tudo para protegê-lo de Jotaro. Josuke e Okuyasu descobrem um homem que vive em uma torre de energia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Masazo Kinoto, um arquiteto excêntrico, visita Rohan para inspecionar a casa danificada pelo fogo. Josuke e Kanedaichi lutam na torre.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan fica em apuros depois de ver as costas de Kinoto. Um jovem surge diante de Josuke com um papel dobrado que esconde algo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan não pode expor as costas e pede ajuda a Koichi, que não acredita nele. Apesar do risco que corre, Rohan vai ao hotel de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri finalmente acaba com Hayato. Depois de saberem o que houve com Hayato, Rohan e os outros vão verificar a casa de Kawajiri.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hayato percebe que todos os que ficam sabendo de Yoshikage Kira através dele morrem e que, depois disso, a mesma manhã se repete.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira pretende remover o terceiro poder, Bites The Dust, porque Hayato matou várias pessoas e voltou à mesma manhã. Mas alguém surge diante de Kira.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Uma bomba de ar invade a casa onde Josuke e Hayato estão escondidos. Nenhum dos dois sabe como a bomba conseguiu detectá-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo encurralado, Kira não desiste. Ele usa o Bites The Dust em uma socorrista e tenta explodir o tempo ativando o detonador pelo Deadly Queen.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Adeus, Morioh – O coração de ouro

programme.title: Com o Stand mais apropriado, Koichi Hirose chega a Nápoles em busca de Haruno Shiobana, suspeito de ser filho de Dio Brando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vida de Giorno, uma criança abandonada, muda quando ele ajuda um mafioso a escapar da morte. Giorno aprende mais sobre seus poderes ao enfrentar Bruno Bucciarati.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Determinado a ingressar na máfia, Giorno vai à prisão falar com Polpo, um dos principais membros da Passione, e recebe um teste de iniciação impossível.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Conheça o gângster atrás do muro

programme.title: Giorno luta contra o Stand de Polpo, que pode se movimentar livremente pelas sombras. Koichi conta a Giorno sobre a flecha que produz um Stand.

programme.title: Quando a notícia do tesouro escondido de Polpo se espalha entre os membros da Passione, Bucciarati e seu bando partem para pegá-lo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Em busca da fortuna de Polpo!

programme.title: Com o desaparecimento misterioso da tripulação de Bucciarati no convés, Abbacchio lança seu Stand, Moody Jazz, para investigar esse preocupante fenômeno.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O bando descobre que sua chegada a Capri reserva um perigo. Com Giorno, Mista começa a neutralizar o inimigo com seu Stands, o Six Bullets.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mista é atraído para um caminhão em movimento. Nele, o Stand de Sale, Arts & Crafts, mostra sua habilidade de controlar as balas do Six Bullet.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Bucciarati entrega as joias de Polpo ao Chefe, Pericolo, e é promovido a caporegime da Passione.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Durante uma operação, Narancia é interceptado por Formaggio, membro do Time de Assassinos, que encolhe o capanga usando os poderes de Tiny Feet.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Narancia, cada vez menor, tenta se manter vivo enquanto Formaggio continua a pressioná-lo para descobrir o paradeiro da filha do chefe.

programme.title: Guardiões do Tempo, (2020, Science fiction)

programme.desc: Trenk, de dez anos, camponês e propriedade do malvado Sir Wertolt, quer se tornar um cavaleiro e libertar sua família. Depois de muitas aventuras, ele resolve o problema do dragão do ducado e é nomeado cavaleiro pelo duque.

programme.title: A jornada mágica de Emily, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Depois da morte de seu pai, a pequena Emily tenta ajudar sua mãe a reencontrar a felicidade e aprender sobre o pai que nunca conheceu.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: A Lenda do Mestre Chinês, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A história do filme é baseada em uma lenda chinesa e gira em torno de um jovem estudante (Raymond Lam) que se apaixona por uma bela mulher (Huang Shengyi), sem saber que ela é uma cobra branca que assumiu a forma humana.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na América, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Jet Li é Wong Fei-Hong, herói chinês que vai à América, é salvo por índios e luta contra a exploração de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.desc: A história do filme é baseada em uma lenda chinesa e gira em torno de um jovem estudante (Raymond Lam) que se apaixona por uma bela mulher (Huang Shengyi), sem saber que ela é uma cobra branca que assumiu a forma humana.

programme.desc: Jet Li é Wong Fei-Hong, herói chinês que vai à América, é salvo por índios e luta contra a exploração de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo é um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vítima de suas armadilhas é o inspetor de polícia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que são brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: Brief Encounter, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

programme.title: The Pink Panther, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this riotously funny farce, Peter Sellers introduced the world to Jacques Clouseau, the clumsiest Inspector ever to trip over a case, who is out to stop the notorious Phantom (David Niven) from stealing the priceless Pink Panther diamond!

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Peter Sellers and Elke Sommer star in this successful sequel to The Pink Panther in which Inspector Clouseau tries to prove a beautiful parlor maid is innocent of killing her chauffer lover.

programme.title: The Return of the Pink Panther, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: The hilarious, accidentally brilliant Inspector Clouseau once again takes on his archenemy, the insane Dreyfus, as he plots to control the world.

programme.title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: Chief Inspector Dreyfus (Herbert Lom) is finally driven mad by Inspector Clouseau's (Peter Sellers) incompetence and commandeers a doomsday device along with a demand for Clouseau’s death. Are 26 hired assassins a match for Clouseau's dumb luck?

programme.title: Revenge of the Pink Panther, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Peter Sellers’ comedic genius shines when the hapless Inspector Clouseau is presumed to be dead. However, the very much alive Inspector travels to Hong Kong to investigate a dangerous drug lord (Robert Webber). Dyan Cannon and Herbert Lom also star.

programme.title: Trail of the Pink Panther, (1982, Comedy)
programme.desc: This tribute to the late Peter Sellers contains unused scenes from the previous Pink Panther films interspersed with new footage and features a great comedic cast.

programme.title: The Fugitive Kind, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: In this Tennessee Williams masterpiece, Marlon Brando is superb as a paradoxical drifter drawn into the desperate lives of two passionate women, Maureen Stapleton and Joanne Woodward, in a small Mississippi town.

programme.title: Lilies of the Field, (1963, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Nominated for 5 Academy Awards® including Best Picture and winner of the Best Actor Oscar® for Sidney Poitier for his role as an itinerant handyman who stops to help five impoverished nuns and the small Arizona desert town in which they reside.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 4, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover reteam as a pair of Los Angeles police detectives. Promoted to desk jobs to keep them out of trouble, the two cops join forces with a junior detective and a fast-talking private investigator to unravel a series of crimes.

programme.title: Tears of the Sun, (2003, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: After a West African president's family is assassinated and civil unrest is rampant, a top-secret team is deployed to the far reaches of the jungle to rescue a U.S. doctor who is acting as a missionary.

programme.title: Armored, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: A crew of officers at an armored transport security firm embark on the ultimate heist – against their own company. The seemingly fool-proof plan soon proves to be useless when an unexpected witness interferes, as the plan quickly unravels.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III, (2006, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan’s wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Silent Hill, (2005, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling horror action game, Silent Hill stars Radha Mitchell (Man on Fire) as Rose, a desperate mother who takes her adopted daughter, Sharon, to the town of Silent Hill in an attempt to cure her of her ailment. Rating: R

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Zombies)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Diary of the Dead, (2007, Zombies)
programme.desc: While on location filming a horror movie, a group of college students finds themselves overrun by zombies, and ultimately end up capturing the epidemic on film.

programme.title: Escape Room, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: For a birthday celebration, three couples partake in an ESCAPE ROOM, in which they must work together to solve puzzles in order to escape the room—but when the game turns deadly, they quickly learn the only winners are the survivors.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Crawl, (2019, Creature Features)
programme.desc: As a hurricane tears through Florida, Haley rushes to find her father, who is injured and trapped in the crawl space of their home. With the storm intensifying and water levels rising, the pair face an even bigger threat lurking below the surface.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)

programme.desc: When the world's heavyweight champion is sent to prison, everything points to an inevitable showdown with the penitentiary's undefeated champ. But to make sure the meeting will happen, a former mob boss must call in favors from the outside world.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: Undisputed, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: When the world's heavyweight champion is sent to prison, everything points to an inevitable showdown with the penitentiary's undefeated champ. But to make sure the meeting will happen, a former mob boss must call in favors from the outside world.

programme.title: The Last Letter, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: Catherine Wright struggles with a debilitating sleep disorder. Her husband Michael struggles to cope when their newborn son lay in the wake.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Special ID, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: An undercover cop (Donnie Yen) infiltrates one of China's most ruthless crime syndicates. He must risk everything to protect his family and his life after the boss (Collin Chou) vows to find and kill every traitor in his organization.

programme.title: Ip Man, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Ip Man is the award-winning film adaptation about the life story of Ip Man, the grandmaster of the Wing Chun style of kung fu and sifu of legendary martial arts superstar, Bruce Lee.

programme.title: Ip Man 2, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Newly arrived in Hong Kong, martial arts instructor Ip Man encounters stiff opposition when he begins teaching the Wing Chun fighting style. But instead of bowing to his rivals' demands, he perseveres and retaliates with amazing speed and power.

programme.title: Ip Man 3, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive third installment of the blockbuster martial arts series, when a band of brutal gangsters led by crooked property developer (Mike Tyson) make a play to take over the city, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Donnie Yen stars as infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho, who ruthlessly carved out his empire in 1960's Hong Kong.

programme.title: Raging Fire, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Shan (Donnie Yen) is a hardline cop with a long history of success, but his past comes back to haunt him when a sting is attacked by a group led by his former protégé (Nicholas Tse), a man set on destroying everyone who ever wronged him.

programme.title: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Incredible martial arts sequences mark this thriller about a legendary fighter who takes on ruthless outside oppressors in World War II-era Shanghai.

programme.title: The Big Boss, (1971, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Lee faces an underground criminal element after members of his family begin disappearing. Now he must break his vow of non-violence to take on the terrifying "Big Boss."

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Comedy)
programme.desc: Following a massive heart attack, Randal enlists his friends and fellow clerks Dante, Elias, Jay, and Silent Bob to make a movie immortalizing his life at the convenience store that started it all.

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Reboot, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jay and Silent Bob return to Hollywood to stop a reboot of the BLUNTMAN AND CHRONIC movie from getting made.

programme.title: The Hustle, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two incorrigible scam artists -- one low rent and the other high class -- compete to swindle a naïve tech prodigy out of his vast fortune.

programme.title: Vamps, (2012, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two socialite vampires in New York City (Krysten Ritter of TV’s DON’T TRUST THE B*** and Alicia Silverstone of CLUELESS) fall in love while being pursued by vampire hunters.

programme.title: Instructions Not Included, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: Valentin (Eugenio Derbez) is Acapulco’s resident playboy until his life gets turned upside down when a former fling leaves a baby girl on his doorstep.

programme.title: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: When their TV is Stolen, Beavis and Butt-head hit the road in a hilarious film debut that proves what millions of fans already know: Beavis and Butt-head RULE!

programme.title: Black Sheep, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dedicated to helping his big brother Al (Tim Matheson) win the race for Washington State governor, he turns every opportunity for votes into an embarrassing disaster.

programme.title: Angel Eyes, (2001, Drama)
programme.desc: After meeting under extraordinary life-and-death circumstances, a Chicago police officer (Lopez) and a lost soul named Catch (Caviezel) fall in love. While uncovering the truth about Catch, she is forced to deal with the secrets of her own past. Rated-R

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: The Promise, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A love triangle emerges between a photojournalist, a dance instructor, and a medical student during the final days of the Ottoman Empire.

programme.title: Becoming Jane, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway gives a radiant performance as a young, lovestruck Jane Austen in this witty and engaging comedy, exploring the untold romance that inspired the novels of one of the worlds most celebrated authors.

programme.title: Death Defying Acts, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: On a tour of Britain in 1926, Harry Houdini enters into a passionate affair with a psychic out to con the famous magician.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winner Nicole Kidman captures the beauty and elegance of Grace Kelly in this true story of her transition from Hollywood starlet to Princess of Monaco.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: East-West tensions erupt when the CIA suspects that renegade Russian scientists are developing more nuclear weapons.

programme.title: Road to Perdition, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.

programme.title: The Burnt Orange Heresy, (2020, Drama)

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Wild Bill, (1995, Western)

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction, (2014, Blockbusters)

programme.title: The Boxtrolls, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When evil Archibald Snatcher decides to capture the Boxtrolls – lovable, box-wearing creatures – it’s up to Eggs and his friend Winnie to same them.

programme.title: ParaNorman, (2012, Science fiction)

programme.title: A Few Good Men, (1992, Courtroom Drama)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle, (1993, Romantic comedy)

programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)

programme.desc: Richard Harris stars in this superior sequel which follows the plight of a horribly wronged tribe of Sioux Indians and the white man who would join in their revenge.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around…

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has joined the enemy! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies to whittle Joey's forces into waste! Is this the last we'll see of him, or will a legendary guardian recognize Joey as a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world's conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his guardian monsters.

programme.title: Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!

programme.title: While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Oden’s Secret Swordplay!

programme.title: Queen, the Lead Performer, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!

programme.title: King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Shinobu tries to protect him, but they are cornered by one of the strong Lead Performers from the Animal Kingdom Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Won’t Forgive Him! Chopper’s Determination!

programme.title: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy's declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sasaki’s Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!

programme.title: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Chopper’s Fire Trick!

programme.title: Sanji hears a woman's scream for help and dashes into the room the scream can be heard from. However, it's a trap set up by Black Maria of the Tobi Roppo. Meanwhile, Luffy and Jimbei who are trying to reach the rooftop get help from the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It’s Not Okay! The Spider lures Sanji!

programme.title: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido's head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Yamato’s Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro's way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro's determination and tries to pave the way for him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Marco’s Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy's strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he's ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls "heaven."
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!

programme.title: Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!

programme.title: After watching the Straw Hats' departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she's here on Onigashima, it's time to execute her powerful plan – Operation Kibi Dango!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Otama’s Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!

programme.title: Sanji is captured and tortured by the merciless Black Maria. She names the terms of his release: to turn over one of his crewmates. He hesitates but has no other option. After much distress, he makes a move that surprises everyone.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji’s Scream! An SOS Echoes Over the Island!

programme.title: Robin bursts in to rescue Sanji along with Brook, and faces Black Maria, who is trying to keep Sanji as her pet. Meanwhile, Yamato, Momonosuke, and Shinobu are spotted hiding by the enemy, and they find themselves on the run again.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!

programme.title: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn't just them who were devastated by Queen's raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The wounded Akazaya members are surprised to see Kozuki Oden alive. They were disappointed by their failure to take down Kaido, but now with their lord, they are filled with hope to face their sworn enemy again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Akazaya Members!

programme.title: The Akazaya members run to save Momonosuke, but an unexpected contender stands in their way. Queen gets infuriated after Chopper ruined his plot and goes after him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors’ Deadly Attack!

programme.title: The returned Orochi clashes the Akazaya members who are trying to save Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others are all covered in bruises, but they unite their strength and launch an attack.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!

programme.title: Even after Big Mom was pushed off of the island, Zoro and the others keep fighting the exhausting battle against Kaido. When Kaido tries to beat up the unconscious Luffy, Zoro launches an all-out attack at the risk of his life.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defend Luffy! Zoro and Law’s Sword Technique!

programme.title: Luffy remembers how he was advised by his friends, how he was saved by his comrades, and the frustrations of being defeated. As Kaido mocks him to his face, the Color of the Supreme King Haki gushes out and they clash again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!

programme.title: Countless souls have been lured along the Grand Line in pursuit of the legendary One Piece! Luffy D. Monkey is a young pirate with a dream: to prove the legend true and be king of them all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'm Luffy! The Man Who's Gonna Be King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy and his new companion Coby set sail in search of the infamous pirate hunter Zoro, rumored to be held captive at the Marine Base.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!

programme.title: Luffy is in the line of fire after saving Zoro, and now tyrannical Captain Morgan is out for their heads! Zoro must decide if he will join forces with Luffy or die in captivity.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Morgan versus Luffy! Who's the Mysterious Pretty Girl?

programme.title: Luffy recalls a time when Captain Red-Haired Shanks taught him a valuable lesson in friendship and set him on his quest to be King of the Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy crosses paths with the clever thief Nami. A navigator on a quest to collect one hundred million berries, she’s perfect for Luffy’s new crew – except for the fact that Nami hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Terrifying Mysterious Power! Captain Buggy, the Clown Pirate!

programme.title: Having delivered a deadly blow to Captain Buggy’s pirates, Luffy and his companions need a place to recuperate. But the three are not in hiding very long before the Beast Tamer Mohji seeks them out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!

programme.title: In the ongoing fight with Captain Buggy’s pirates, Zoro must face off with the Acrobat Cabaji while Luffy continues to do battle with the Pirate Clown himself.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro vs. Acrobat Cabaji!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees…
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vault maker Marukin Safe Company is forced into bankruptcy after Lupin cracks open their impenetrable safes. To test his own skills, Marukin's son challenges Lupin to open a safe he has designed…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: While trying to snag General Hatler's prize medallion, which contains a fifty-carat ruby, Lupin inadvertently reels in Hatler's biggest secret, his toupee! An enraged General Hatler orders Lupin and his gang to be killed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Upon returning to Japan, Goemon finds his master on the brink of death. Furthermore, Jinkuro, a fellow disciple, had stolen half of the scroll containing the Secret Arts of the Iga Ninja. Will Goemon be able to avenge his master?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are in a remote area pursing a mysterious treasure, when they save a woman being chased by hoodlums. The woman invites the two back to her sister's manor, which is full of beautiful women…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A mysterious woman who claims to be Fujiko's aunt, gives Lupin an ultimatum: Find Marshal Rommel's lost gold or die! First, Lupin must decipher the location of the gold, written in ancient hieroglyphs.
programme.sub-title: A Witch in the Fourth Dimension

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The great thief Nezumi-Kozou Jirokichi IV appears before Goemon and reveals that their ancestors competed in the first International Thieves Championship together, but were defeated by Lupin's grandfather, Arsène Lupin…
programme.sub-title: The Phantom Thief Rat Boy Appears

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The warden of an African prison is holding Fujiko captive. Lupin and his gang infiltrate the prison and attempt to break Fujiko out, but they become the target of the Iron Lizards, robotic devices developed to chase down fugitives!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Linda, a beautiful dancer, has stolen Jigen's heart and a vengeful Meyer has taken Fujiko hostage. Believing the women they love are in danger and unaware that Linda and Meyer are working together, Lupin and Jigen are set up to kill each other…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: According to legend, a stamp named the Cinderella Shadow is said to make its owner a princess. Lupin and his gang pull off the heist, but a girl name Alice who also wants the stamp tags along. Will the little girl get her royal wish?
programme.sub-title: Where did the Cinderella Stamp Go?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has sent a notice declaring he will steal all the cash from every bank in Paris. Detective Melon, the granddaughter of Inspector Garimard, is chosen to catch Lupin alongside Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has many secret techniques up his sleeve, and one of them is his Levitation Technique. In order to get their hands on this technique, a crime syndicate plots a dirty trick, where a fake Lupin tortures a man known as X8 and frames the real Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Inspector Zenigata get kidnapped and the two are forcibly conscripted into the Foreign Legion in Morocco. Lupin and Inspector Zenigata make a run for it, but not before they're shackled together at the neck.
programme.sub-title: The Wind in Morocco is Hot

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Beautiful Swedish twins, Latica and Anita, are engaged in a battle to the death over the Viking treasure map concealed on their backs. In disguise, Lupin learns the map's secret, but the map possesses an additional secret.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A hit has been ordered on Lupin and Puma, a formidable hitman who specializes in long-range attacks, is on his trail! Lupin takes his chances with a close range, one-on-one showdown against Puma, but the plan seemingly backfires and Lupin is shot…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Orion's Crown has been stolen and is up for grabs at a black-market auction. Lupin has his eyes on both the crown and the auction money, but first he must outsmart the other parties vying for the crown, including Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A two-thousand-year-old casket has been excavated. Inside the casket is Camilla, a beautiful woman in a near-death state, holding a golden statuette of the Virgin Mary. Lupin attempts to steal the golden statuette, but things don't go as planned…
programme.sub-title: Lupin Who Turned into a Vampire

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are attending a party in Africa, waiting for an opportunity to snatch a rare black pearl. However, their plan goes awry when a gang of gorillas crashes the party and steals the black pearl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Massive riches have been hidden inside Tsukikage Castle. Lupin and his gang must decipher a code to find out the whereabouts of this great treasure. Wii Lupin be able to locate the treasure before his rivals do?
programme.sub-title: Uncover the Secret of Tsukikage Castle

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen head to Mongolia in search of Genghis Khan's treasures. Meanwhile, Goemon is visiting his ancestor's grave to pay his respects when he encounters Fujiko, who is in search of Yoshitsune Minamoto's buried treasure.
programme.sub-title: The Hidden Gold of Genghis Khan

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO chief promises to erase Fujiko's criminal record in exchange for her cooperation in arresting Lupin. Up against an ego-bruised Inspector Zenigata and a determined Fujiko, have Lupin's heisting days come to an end?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen sneak on board a ship smuggling diamonds. However, what they find on board are several thousand chickens! Lupin and his gang infiltrate the Hong Kong smuggling boss's lair where diamonds are being illicitly sold…
programme.sub-title: Diamonds Disappeared Under the Sky of Hong Kong

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal a suitcase containing Costa Rican diamonds, but the contents turns out to be Inspector Zenigata. The real diamonds are being shipped to Puerto Rico inside a missile and Lupin must find out the precise launch time to intercept it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaguya, a beautiful woman, separately asks Lupin, Jigen and Goemon to gather the tears of the Yeti, a mermaid's scale, and the liver of a dragon so she can make a secret potion.
programme.sub-title: Search for the Treasure of Princess Kaguya

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A wealthy shipping magnate and also a bachelor, Onabes' final voyage is nothing short of extravagant, with a ship full of beautiful women and fine art. Things go as planned when Lupin infiltrates the ship disguised as a woman…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Hong Kong for a vacation when he is asked to find a woman in return for helping him escape from Inspector Zenigata. Lupin discovers the pickpocket who stole his wallet is the daughter of the woman he is looking for…
programme.sub-title: Where are the Peking Man's Bones?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Sleeping Lion, a statue made of solid gold, is being transported to a museum by a specially armored, airtight car. Lupin steals the armored car together with the statue and nearly asphyxiated Inspector Zenigata inside.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal crime boss Mulligan's precious jewels, only have them stolen from him by Fujiko! Mulligan, unaware that Fujiko has his jewels, hires a skilled gunman named Hangman to take them back from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has been put on auction at the Wanted Club and Dr. Mad places the winning bid. Dr. Mad also purchases Fujiko and Jigen from the auctions. The three are abandoned on a deserted island with killer cyborgs.
programme.sub-title: Lupin is Available to the Highest Bidder

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the second chapter of the Matrix trilogy, Zion falls under siege to the Machine Army. Neo and Trinity choose to return to the Matrix with Morpheus. Now, Neo must follow the path he has chosen if he is to save humanity.

programme.title: The Matrix Revolutions, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this final chapter of the Matrix trilogy, Neo, Morpheus, and Trinity battle to defend Zion against the onslaught of the machines that have enslaved the human race. And Neo faces the consequences of the choice made in The Matrix Reloaded.

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: Set in 79 A.D., POMPEII tells the epic story of Milo, a slave turned invincible gladiator who finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, Cassia, the beautiful daughter of a wealthy merchant.

programme.title: Robocop, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) -- a loving husband, father and good cop -- is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

programme.title: Machete Kills, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: The machete-wielding federale returns in this sequel that pits him in a violent battle against a maniacal arms dealer and a revolutionary.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A hit man must beat the top assassins in the world.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
